thread.title: Innodisk shows their "Competitive Edge" at Global Gaming Expo (G2E) 2015
thread.title_full: Innodisk shows their "Competitive Edge" at Global Gaming Expo (G2E) 2015

author: admin
title: Innodisk shows their "Competitive Edge" at Global Gaming Expo (G2E) 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/23/2015 @ 3:00 PM   InnoDisk 
FREMONT, Calif., Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Innodisk shows why they continue to generate attention with their competitive portfolio of products at G2E 2015 in Las Vegas, NV, happening September 29 through October 1. Innodisk presents their lineup of flash memory products that are more compact, reliable, provide longer life cycles, and focus heavily on security for industrial embedded systems. They will also highlight their SATADOM(TM) product line, which continues to maintain its relevance in innovative design systems. While exhibiting the industry's widest selection of flash memory form factors, Innodisk also displays their DRAM and other value added products. Visit booth 4005 and get familiar with Innodisk's "Competitive Edge." 
Staying Competitive 
Innodisk's desire to provide absolute service was the driver behind the optional write protect feature specifically tailored for one of our customers for its unique use in the gaming industry. A jumper was used as a security insert that prevents copying, deleting, or writing new data to a thumb drive. This feature allowed the USB drive to be in read only mode when the jumper was removed. Technology continues to grow and develop needing products to transform and shape all aspects of the gaming industry. As pioneers and service and solution focused hardware technology innovators, Innodisk provides products to support current needs and looks toward the future as visionaries that maintain a competitive nature in the market. 
The SATADOM(TM) 
Innodisk maintains their "Competitive Edge" and continues their market growth in the gaming industry with the SATADOM(TM). Innodisk pioneered the SATADOM(TM) because there was no other product on the market that could simplify a system's overall design better. Innodisk's SATADOM(TM) was designed with our patented Power Pin 7 or Pin 8 to simplify our customer's system design. Since this design will require no external power cable it is more robust and enhances the disk functions of various industrial and enterprise applications. Touting the highest capacity and fastest performance, it also comes in over seven mechanical sizings to fit anyone's application. 
Industrial DRAM Products 
Innodisk continues to display the versatility and strength of their portfolio by presenting its unbuffered industrial memory products that include DDR4 modules. Innodisk DDR4 operates at 2133Mhz with capacities up to 16GB. DDR4 is 30% more power efficient with lower voltage requirements. To support the gaming industry's further need for industrial environments, Innodisk's DDR3 provides wide temperature products that allow -40 degrees C to +85 degrees C usage. Unbuffered DRAM is a necessity for most user applications and Innodisk delivers with their standard DDR3 and DDR4 series, coatings, and other specialized products. 
Industrial Flash Products 
Innodisk doesn't just stop at highlighting SATADOM(TM) products. There is a rich portfolio of products on display. The strong line of Compact Flash products include; iCF1SE, iCF1ME and iCF9000. In addition to Compact Flash there are CFAST, ServerDOM, 2.5" SSD's 3ME2, 3MG2-P, and 3IE. All these form factors also come in wide temperature ranges -40 degrees C to +85 degrees C to make them suitable for not only the gaming industry but for all industrial applications. With so many products that can be customized to fit different industry needs, Innodisk's portfolio is truly one of variety and innovation. 
You are invited to visit us at: 
Global Gaming Expo 2015Location: Sands Expo Convention Center, Las Vegas, NV, USADate: September 29, 30, & October 1, 2015Booth: #4005 
About Global Gaming Expo 2015 
Global Gaming Expo (G2E) is the international gaming trade show and conference "by the industry and for the industry." Organized by the American Gaming Association (AGA) and Reed Exhibitions, it defines itself as the preeminent show for the gaming-entertainment industry. G2E is the place to conduct business, connect with peers and learn cutting-edge ways to become a better gaming professional. 
About Innodisk 
Innodisk is a service driven provider of flash memory and DRAM products for the industrial and enterprise applications. With satisfied customers across the embedded, aerospace and defense, cloud storage markets and more, we have set ourselves apart with a commitment to dependable products and unparalleled service. This has resulted in products including embedded peripherals designed to supplement existing industrial solutions and high IOPS flash arrays for industrial and enterprise applications. The expanded business lines are leading our next step in being a comprehensive solution and service provider in industrial storage industry. 
Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan with engineering support and sales teams in China, Europe, Japan, and the United States, Innodisk is able to support clients globally. With abundant experience and an unrivaled knowledge of the memory industry, Innodisk develops products with excellent quality, remarkable performance, great cost-efficiency, and the highest reliability. For more information about Innodisk, please visit www.innodisk.com .
